means: 亚述的，亚述人的，亚述语的

sentence.Network_en: Egypt, relieved for a time from Assyrian pressure, entered upon a phase of revival.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃及由于暂时没有遭受亚述的压迫而进入了一个中兴阶段.

sentence.Network_en: Judah was facing the brutal and fearless Assyrian power.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹大面对残暴的、无惧的亚述的力量.

sentence.Network_en: Assyrian warriors curled their long beards with scented oils.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚述族的武士曾用芬香的油料来卷曲他们的长胡子.
